title: Loading screen black for a bit
body:
Whenever I load into a game, the loading screen stays black for about a minute or so, it then loads normally. It scares me for a bit because I think I'm going to dc, then get leaver buster.

Is this a me thing, or is this just a League thing?

replies.body: The black screen can happen if your network is struggling to download assets.  It's possible that this can continue to degrade so it's important to try and fix it up now!  My suggestion would be to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help tune up your network to the game server.  I hope that helps!
Well, I see others are having the issue as well. My friends & my ranked team mates. Are you sure it's not a game thing? I don't see it being my toaster internet if everyone I know is getting it.
Happened to me. Turned to a dc and got a leaverbuster. The system is busted
Oh dear.... that hasn't happened to me yet. I hope this gets fixed soon then, it's very annoying.
